manual.title: __**Welcome To The World Of GT Fitness!**__
description: In this Gran Turismo/Cars/Racing related server, you are able to gain points in the chat to earn new licenses (leveled roles) in GT Fitness. You can also use my custom GT Fitness bot to gain credits, exp, points, etc through multiple events!
You can view your points by typing **t!rank** in the bot commands channel.
:warning: You are allowed to speak English or Japanese!

manual.title: __**Start Your GTF Career!**__
description: Chat across the GTF channels, find settings of what's best for you, use **!home** to start your GTF career with the custom GTF bot!

manual.title: __**Reminder: This Is A Gran Turismo Server**__
description: If you do not have interest in Gran Turismo, racing games, or cars, you will be asked to leave the server.

manual.title: __**FAQs**__
description: **How can you earn points for new licenses?**

1. Typing in the chat. You earn 50-60 points per every message (approx.)
2. Any giveaways announced in <#424247409699192833>.
:warning: The maximum of points for a giveaway is 5,000.
**Where is the channel for bot commands?**

1. Generally, its <#432667283031195648>.
2. For other bots in the server, you can unlock them through earning licenses, and you can use them in its designated lobby.

manual.title: __**License Rewards**__
description:
__**J License | 100,000pts**__
J License Commands
<#429025543329939476>
Access to Audit Log in server settings
Eligible for Moderator
Eligible for Adminstrator
Go Live Feature

manual.title: __**Rules**__
description:
:one: Discord server invites and any hefty advertisements are not allowed, except for in <#644052910334017556>.
:warning: Smaller advertisements are allowed; however, keep it at a minimum.

:two: Any NSFW pictures, avatars, videos, or memes are not allowed in open lobbies or **any channel** except for lobbies with a ðŸ”ž label.
Some examples that aren't allowed in normal lobbies may include:
Extreme blood/gore
Graphic/Sexual activity
Extremely offensive content

:warning: Any other NSFW pictures from bots such as inputting rule34 and e621 in any command may result in warnings, kicks, and bans from moderators. This includes spoilers and || even more spoilers ||. Even <#508820132513054720> applies this rule.

:three: Do not spam in any channel, the bot will give you a warning and a mute if you persist.
:warning: Spam is only allowed in <#348854157698138112> and <#432667283031195648>.

:four: Duplicate accounts are prohibited without logical reasons (i.e. temporary account, 2-Step authentication loss, etc).
:warning: You will not get your points/credits/progress back.

:five: Once you have gaming roles, you commit of any pings by GTF members. Remove them if it bothers you.
:warning: Do not spam roles either because rule 3.

manual.title: __**Rules - Part 2**__
description:
:six: For any serious conversations, vents, or very controversial news/politics, use <#679590180742496361>.
:warning: Any disrespectful jokes (or any jokes that may deem hateful or offensive for most) in this channel may result in an immediate kick or ban.

:seven: Respect each other. Enough said.
:warning: Any complaints can be reported by pinging Moderator or Adminstrator roles.
:eight: Limit the amount of drama in lobbies (unless for satirical purposes). Any disrespect or ignorance against the rules may result in mutes, kicks, or bans.
:nine: When you are muted, **do not rejoin the server to avoid a mute.** You will have an automatic temporary/permanent ban.
:keycap_ten: Generally, keep bot commands in <#432667283031195648>, you may get a warning from the moderation bot if you do. Some commands do have exceptions (this will be implemented soon).
:one::one: Any bugs or suggestions for the GTF bot can be reported by either by pinging the owner or in <#560574424198152212>.
:one::two: Read the channel descriptions from each channel. They may save you a lot of time.

:one::three: Follow Discord's Community Guildlines.
:warning: You will be kicked/banned from the server if you are under 13 years old.
:question: **Violating any GTF rules may result first with some warnings. If any more problems continues, this may result in a mute, kick, ban, any removal of Tatsumaki points, or credits.**

manual.title: __**Etiquettes**__
description:
<#508820132513054720>
In this lobby, generally many memes such as edgy, dank, funny content can be posted here except for the following:
- NSFW content (belongs in #freedom-lobby)
- Dark humor (especially involving death or intentional hatred against a certain group) (belongs in #freedom-lobby)
- Sensitive/Offensive Content (belongs practically nowhere)

:warning: If a certain meme gets too controversial from others, mods are allowed to delete the meme and/or provide warnings.

<#748053732582752326>
This is a resource/discussion for any glitches/bugs/exploits you can discover across racing games. Other games that aren't related to racing are also open. Even if you think if the certain action may not be a glitch, they can also be posted here for discussions. The following posts will not be allowed and will be deleted and/or lead to warnings:
- NSFW content
- Memes that does not present any in-game glitches
- Mods/Hacks/Addons that does not result in-game glitches
